sermons.title: Trying To Restrict God by Chuck Smith
sermons.description: This sermon very recently preached, speaks to the current situation of Christianity andthe world. Chuck Smith humbly shows the need for Christians to rely on the Word of God and simple obedience to the Holy Spirit. He also calls for a radical change in our lifes to be more Christ-like so that the world will know us as followers of Christ and not religous hyprocrites with no real difference then what the world can offer.
